Record.ClassificationPath: Chemicals_and_Drugs_Kind/Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material/Pharmacologic Substance/Antineoplastic Agent/Alkylating Agent/Antineoplastic Alkylating Agent/Ethylenimine Compound/Ethylenimine
Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: A monofunctional alkylating agent with potential antineoplastic activity. Reacting with DNA mainly at guanine and adenine residues, ethylenimine alkylates DNA, thereby producing DNA interstrand crosslinks and DNA breaks, and interfering with DNA replication and cell division. (NCI04)
